marketing information: An ultra-narrow bezel around the screen crafts AOC 67 Series 23"monitors with a seemingly borderless appearance. The display boasts a 50,000,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio, integrated with new Advanced High-performance In-Plane Switching (AH-IPS) technology that gives higher definition, better color accuracy and greater light transmission from all viewing positions than traditional TN panels.
